verbose_text: Insulin sensitivity was quantified using the homeostasis model assessment of insulin resistance (HOMA-IR) equation to measure fasting insulin and glucose levels (HOMA-IR = I x 3 G/22.5), where ' I ' is insulin (IU/mL) and ' G ' is glucose (mmol/L) (IR : HOMA-index> = 2.5muU/mL x mmol/L) [XREF_BIBR].
